title: Rz is recruiting
selftext:
RZ is Recruiting 
We play Vital 2x Large

𝗥𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀/𝗠𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗺𝘂𝗺𝘀
- 2k+ hours
- Be Active.
- Don't be toxic
- Ages 15+
- Have a decent Mic
- Recruiting NA and EU
- Everyone farms no exceptions lmao
- Please be half decent with the Ak
- Be able to listen to leader.Dm me for more info, along with steam profile and roam clips if you have any.
